title: Make your own website!
text: To learn more about Quarto websites visit https://quarto.org/docs/websites.

title: About Me
text: Hi! I’m Dr. June Skeeter. I am a researcher and educator currently working at the University of British Columbia. I specialize in micrometeorology, geospatial data science, and machine learning methods. I’m a fluent Python programmer with functional proficiency in a number of other languages including JavaScript and Matlab. I prefer to work with open source options whenever possible because accessibility of information, transparency in data analysis, and minimizing barriers to access are central to my pedagogical philosophy and personal research practices. I’ve created this website to highlight some of my work and provide a template that others can use to make their own website!

title: My Work
text:

I developed and open access GIS course for the UBC Geography department, you can find the course here: https://geos270.github.io/Syllabus/.
